title: What are some positive examples of American exceptionalism? - Quora
tags: Culture of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: When the people pay the bills and the government eats well. When the people obey laws and the government does not. When the people work hard and their President takes  their rights and puts them in harms way In America the people are pawns.  They must follow all the rules the government is exempt from.

You demand for quantitative citations entirely misses the point.   Look at the first sentence of the Wikipedia article on American exceptionalism:  American exceptionalism is the theory that the United States is qualitatively different from other nations. So your question doesn't make sense.  Remember, there is more to the world than just quantitative measurements.   The difference between a cat and a dog or a comedy and tragedy are most easily understood as a qualitative difference.   Similarly, one does not easily arrive at an understanding of national character by scanning over tables of industrial and agricultural output.
